name: MISSION ARES-39
description:
MISSION ARES-39 is a short adventure and story-driven game, where you must return to your home planet, which has been devastated by a catastrophe that erased everything as you knew it. Adventurate back home and discover stories during this dangerous journey. Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys 

Talk/Select: L or X you can also use Enter for the menus

Attack: K or Z

Info:

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #166 using the theme of going back to your roots as part of the concept, soon there will be updates that include combat and a Spanish translation. A mobile version is also planned to be completed.

You can see all the resources I used to create this game here: 

https://itch.io/c/1138831/gamejam-166

Thanks to ZapSplat and these creators for their wonderful work and I give them their respective credits for the assets. 

Special thanks to Veronica Linares for doing the revisions and translations.
